item.description:
Come in like a lion and stay for the company.

Join us for a casual get together over pints. Come on down to swap table-top war stories, get advice on new games, find players for your new campaign.
We're gonna try a Wednesday meet this time. But it won't be anything crazy, it will start early and end early with minimal damage on your wallet and/or liver. All are welcome.

A 3 minute walk from Pandemonium Games in Central Sq. It’s so easy! You can get your game shop browsing AND the mixing and mingling!”
item.how_to_find_us: Find us at the table with big, fat d20 as a centerpiece
item.name: The Living RPG Bulletin Board
